description:
A configurable Windows status bar.

A configurable Windows status bar.
New Features
- implement Microphone widget with volume control and mute functionality 
- implement Bluetooth widget using Windows API integration 
Bugfixes
- correct typo in wallpapers section of config.yaml 
Refactors
- update CLI version to 1.0.2 and enhance log formatting 
- replace hardcoded virtual key codes with constants from system functions 
- add virtual key codes for volume up and down 
- optimize package installation in Windows workflow with force and no-cache options 
Feat
- bump build version to 1.3.7 
Full Changelog: https://github.com/amnweb/yasb/compare/v1.3.6...v1.3.7
